TopicTitle: Where to find KSP planet mugs and salt/pepper shakers.

Articles.Content:
I apologize if this is the wrong section of the forum.

I remember there being KSP salt/pepper shakers that looked like the Mun and Minmus and mugs that looked like Duna and Kerbin in the merch store. But I cannot find them anywhere. I cannot even find pictures or mentions of them online. But I swear they existed...

Do you mean this?

https://ksp.reactor.cc/post/1451278

Doesn't seem to be physical objects, just concept art.
Yeah thats it. But I swear these were actually available for purchase and not just a concept...
